verbs.description: [ARG0: rookie manager from puerto rico] [V: led] [ARG1: red sox] [ARG4: to victory] [ARGM-MNR: with coralytics] cora became the first manager from the island to guide a team to a championship it came more than a year after hurricane maria devastated puerto rico boston boston red sox alex cora era puerto rico red sox
